thread.title: Rocky Mountain Rollergirls slam into new season at the Fillmore
thread.title_full: Rocky Mountain Rollergirls slam into new season at the Fillmore

author: The Know Staff
title: Rocky Mountain Rollergirls slam into new season at the Fillmore
text:
Print Megan Donner aka Nama Stay Away falls as she trips over a teammate during a drill at the Rocky Mountain Roller Girls practice space in Denver, Colorado on April 22, 2014. (Seth McConnell, Denver Post file) 
It’s going to be one hard-hitting weekend when Rocky Mountain Rollergirls kicks off its 11th season inside the Fillmore Auditorium with a double-header. 
Watch Havoc, Carmen Slamdiego and others lap and jam their way around the rink with all the smashing excitement that roller derby brings with it. The event will feature four of Denver’s seasoned home teams (with names like Sugar Kill Gang and United States Pummeling Service) battling with the newbies at 6 and 8 p.m. Kids? The group considers itself “family friendly, with an edge.” 
Doors to the Fillmore open at 5:30 p.m, 1550 Clarkson St. Tickets are $22 at the door; kids 12 and under are free. 99
